text:
="preserve">James Greene (19 May 1931 – January 2021) was a Northern Irish actor. He played lawyers, clergymen, army officers and judges on many movies and television shows. He was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland. He played Scottish clergyman in "Johnny English" (2003), Roy in the medial drama "Holby City" and as Mr. Hubble in "Big School".
Greene died in January 2021, aged 89.
